title: There is nothing of any value to society on the gold coast, we should just nuke it

replies.body: except for the millions of dollars in revenue due to tourism
Which is then spent on centrelink payments for residents (and then some).

And by all means continue to tip your fedora and delude yourself into thinking that you have some miraculous insight and intellect that the rest of the world lacks then use that delusion as an excuse for being a pretentious twat without the requisite skills to engage with society. Sit the fuck down, neckbeard.
I happen to like the Gold Coast, used to be a 30-40min drive from home until I moved back up to North QLD. Gold Coast was the 'Go-to' place for fun.
Touche, I'll take my beer and go watch some Rugby. Enjoy yourselves boys! :D
